channel.title: Where next on my pure?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/2528/statsradeon.png[/img]
I was thinking 99 str but after 84-90str maybe I should get 90 range? Also should I get members for better xp rates?

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

OK get members, quest the attack then get 60 after all quests have been completed - faster 99 strength.

welfare gear = gear that doesnt cost alot, soon as you start going higher levels you will start needing to bring more expensive gear to the wildy to win battles, also it takes more skill as there are more factors to think about.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

Ollie:

you should stake/at a lower level in welfare gear so you become a pro by the time your maxed, opposed to being shit and getting owned because you are not fast enough.

What’s welfare gear? I don’t really stake so much because in f2p it’s limited to 20 or 40k - I forget. I forgot to answer you, but the attack is not quested.

Edit: I’ve decided to go to 99 str, before I train ranged. I’ve never really played on an account with a maxed stat so I would rather experience it sooner. I think at this rate I’ll be 99 within a month.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

you should stake/at a lower level in welfare gear so you become a pro by the time your maxed, opposed to being shit and getting owned because you are not fast enough.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:12, topic:385662”]If you’re going to pk with both range and melee then prayer is probably worth it.
If you ever want to stake though then don’t train prayer.[/quote]

Staking would mean p2p pking which I’m currently not intending to do.

I don’t think I will level prayer until I max my strength at least.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If you’re going to pk with both range and melee then prayer is probably worth it.
If you ever want to stake though then don’t train prayer.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

He wondered why the attack was quested because depending on if you want to stop training attack at 60 and do quests such as monkey madness, which give attack experience, you would need to stop training attack and only gain experience in it through quests. That way you don’t accidentally go over 60 attack when you realize you forgot to do a quest or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

It seems there’s a mixed opinion on training prayer.

[quote=“Ollie, post:5, topic:385662”]Is the attack quested?

Keep low prayer for now, get 90+ range, 94 magic (takes 3-4 days), and 99 strength

and yes get members, more gold and more experience + quests.[/quote]

The attack is not quested but what is the relevance of that?

maniown:

Go members, get climbing boots, d scim, dds/dlong, ancient magicks, and some other randomness. Then max out. Eventually I would go 45, or 52 prayer. Without prayer in members you get absolutely raped.

I do plan on getting 60 attack or so but not until I max.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

In my opinion, the 90 range would certainly be worth having. Adds a little variety to your pvp capabilities.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

get 99 range, botting @ pc you can get it in about 10 days.

Read full topic

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Quest the prayer, then level it though…

Making History Reward: 1,000 Prayer Exp

Mountain Daughter
Reward: 2,000 Prayer Exp

Recruitment drive
Reward: 1,000 Prayer Exp

Restless Ghost
Reward: 1,125 Prayer Exp

Priest in Peril
Reward: 1,400 Prayer Exp

Ghosts Ahoy
Reward: 2,400 Prayer Exp

Rum Deal
Reward: 7,000 Prayer Exp

The Great Brain Robbery
Reward: 6.000 Prayer Exp

item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Is the attack quested?

Keep low prayer for now, get 90+ range, 94 magic (takes 3-4 days), and 99 strength

and yes get members, more gold and more experience + quests.

item.title: Where next on my pure?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I would get members for sure, the training options are infinite compared to free to play. As for skills; I would get 90 range like you suggested and then work up the courage to max strength out.

Thats just my opinion though and I would wait for a better RS player to post their ideas. :o

Read full topic
